scripts.text:
CREATE TABLE Priyadharshini.Product (
    ProductID INT,
    Name VARCHAR(255),
    ProductNumber VARCHAR(255),
    Color VARCHAR(255),
    StandardCost DECIMAL,
    ListPrice DECIMAL,
    Size VARCHAR(255),
    Weight DECIMAL,
    ProductCategoryID INT,
    ProductModelID INT,
    SellStartDate VARCHAR(100),
    SellEndDate VARCHAR(100),
    DiscontinuedDate VARCHAR(100),
    ThumbNailPhoto VARBINARY(6000),
    ThumbnailPhotoFileName VARCHAR(255),
    rowguid VARCHAR(255),
    ModifiedDate VARCHAR(100),
    ParentProductCategoryID INT,
    StartYear INT,
    RankProduct BIGINT,
    ProductID_Long BIGINT,
    UnpivotCol VARCHAR(255),
    UnpivotColumn_Long BIGINT
);
